page.title: 03LIFE AT KINGSWOOD SCHOOL
page.content: The walls of our classroom are covered with work: bird pictures, patterns, book reviews and many other things. We each have a tray in which we keep all our books. We have an art table, a book corner and a maths table. We usually start with Assembly. On Thursday, we have an assembly when we listen to the radio. Afterwards, we often do maths. There are 4 groups in our class and we each do a different subject and then change over. For Art work we are doing about birds, so we do something like a papier-mache bird. If we do topic maths, we do things about shapes. When we do handwriting we usually do it all together. At playtime, the teacher will say, "pack away now". Play-times are at 10.30, 12.00 and 1.45. For lunch we either have sandwiches, a school dinner or go home.The school day is from 8.45-3.00.
